## {{< fa plus title="plus" >}} What should I continue working on? {#continue-working}

- [**Seek feedback on your personal brand from those who know you well.**]{.teal-text} Would they use the same adjectives to describe you? What strengths and characteristics do they perceive that you hadn’t identified yourself? What emotions do your colors, fonts, imagery, and tone evoke? It’s important to remember that your personal brand can (and should) evolve with you!
